sentence.Network_en: He relied on somesthesia to warn him of pressure changes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他依靠体觉来感受压力的变化.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 因此,各种感觉都是由感受器、特定的传人神经及相应中枢的共同活动完成的。 一、躯体感觉的中枢分析躯体感觉(somesthesia)包括浅感觉和深感觉两大类,浅感觉又包括触.
somatotypology 体型学somesthesia 体觉somesthesis 体觉

means.word_mean: 1. the perception of tactual or proprioceptive or gut sensations;

sentences.sentence: "he relied on somesthesia to warn him of pressure changes"

means.word_mean: 2. the faculty of bodily perception; sensory systems associated with the body; includes skin senses and proprioception and the internal organs
